name: Instant Pot® Filipino Chicken Adobo
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: All the flavor you love in Filipino chicken adobo without hours of marinating thanks to the Instant Pot®. Serve over rice, if desired.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs
directions: Whisk vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, olive oil, brown sugar, and crushed peppercorns in a bowl until sugar is dissolved
Stir bay leaves into the sauce
Line the bottom of a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) with onion slices
Place chicken thighs on top of onions and pour vinegar-soy sauce over top
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 10 minutes
Allow 10 minutes for pressure to build
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Release pressure using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes
Using tongs, transfer thighs to the prepared baking sheet, skin-side up
Select Saute function and cook until sauce thickens, 3 to 5 minutes
Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler to high
Place chicken under the preheated broiler, and broil until skin is crispy, 6 to 8 minutes
Transfer thighs to a serving plate and spoon sauce over the top
